text: Rita Reys (21 December 1924 â€“ 28 July 2013) was a jazz singer from the Netherlands. In 1960, she was given the title "Europe's first lady of jazz".Rita Reys @ All About Jazz; accessed 5 March 2014. She sang jazz and bossa nova.John S. Wilson "Rita Reys: First Lady of European Jazz", New York Times, 5 June 1981 Reys was born in Rotterdam. She died in Breukelen at age eighty-eight. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Rita Reys at All About Jazz *Jazz Miscellaneous and More... - page on Rita Reys * Category:1924 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Dutch jazz musicians Category:Dutch singers Category:Jazz singers Category:Musicians from South Holland Category:Entertainers from Rotterdam
title: Rita Reys
